#summary HIVE 2.1 Release Notes

= Release Notes =

The HIVE 2.1 release includes the following major features:
 * Issue [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=33 #33]: Ability to select terms from the indexing results page and export in multiple formats (e.g., SKOS/XML, Dublin Core, MARCXML, MODS) 
 * Issue [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=37 #37]: Add Maui indexing algorithm support
 * Issue [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=13&can=1 #13]: Upgrade to GWT 2.3
 * Issue [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=38 #38]: Add differencing support for website indexing
 * Issue [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=39 #39]: Add support for proxy server configuration when indexing websites
 * Issue [http://code.google.com/p/hive-mrc/issues/detail?id=40 #40]: Add command line support to {{{SimpleTextCrawler}}}

The HIVE 2.1 release includes the following minor features and bug fixes:
 * Fixed minor UI bugs on home and indexing pages.
